# Switch Media Co

## About

Switch Media Co is a digital agency based in **Houston, TX**. We help growth-focused businesses and entrepreneurs scale their online presence through performance-driven marketing and intelligent technology solutions.

## Location

Houston, TX, United States

## Target Audience

Small to mid-sized businesses, startups, and entrepreneurs in Houston and across the United States who want to grow their brand, generate leads, and automate their operations using modern digital tools and AI.

## Core Services

### Digital Advertising

We design and manage targeted paid advertising campaigns across search, social, and display channels. Our approach is data-driven and ROI-focused, helping clients reach the right audience at the right time.

### AI System Integration

We build and deploy custom AI integrations that connect with existing business infrastructure. Our solutions automate workflows, surface actionable insights, and give businesses a measurable competitive advantage.

## Website

https://switchmediaco.com
